messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] visits from truant officer
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/14/03 9:51:35 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... I think anytime it involves our children we always become nervous.  I think that is normal.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/14/03 9:51:35 PM Eastern Standard Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:

> . I WAS a nervous
> wreck, even though I didn't think it would be a big deal.
>

I think anytime it involves our children we always become nervous. I think
that is normal. You handled it well.
Pam G.

messages.subject: visits from truant officer
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/14/03 12:53:39 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/14/03 12:53:39 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Mary T, mostly lurking
PS Ren I wish the best for you. >>

Thanks Mary. It was SO great to hear from all of you here. I WAS a nervous
wreck, even though I didn't think it would be a big deal.
But it looks good right now. I think they're done with us...phew

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett

messages.authorName: Gary m and Mary Anne Taylor
messages.subject: visits from truant officer
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Ren, It might help you to go to www.hsc.org to their legal page. I just re-read part of it and you need to remember that they can t come in or talk to your
messages.messageBody:
Hi Ren,
It might help you to go to www.hsc.org to their legal page. I just re-read part of it and you need to remember that they can't come in or talk to your kids without a warrant. I think that part would apply in any state and with truant officers too, but didn't have time to read that deeply.
Also, to the person from Northern CA with 2 yo who is thinking of unschooling- go to the hsc website (above), and learn about their Conference in August. It is a wonderful way to connect with others even if noone around you is unschooling. There are a lot of unschoolers there.
Mary T, mostly lurking
PS Ren I wish the best for you.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
